name: Simple Karel algorithm
question:
Imagine that Karel is in the 5x5 empty world, on the (1,1) corner, facing east. And we ordered following commands
```js
move
move
turnLeft
move
```
. On what corner will it end up?

name: Algorithm with beepers
question:
Imagine that Karel is in the 5x5 empty world, on the (1,1) corner, facing east. And we ordered following commands
```java
move
move
move
turnLeft
move
move
turnLeft
putBeeper
move
move
```
. On what corner will Karel and beeper it end up?

choices.choice: Karel on (2,3) corner, beeper on (4,3) corner
Karel on (3,2) corner, beeper on (4,2) corner
Karel on (2,3) corner, beeper on (4,2) corner

name: Karel program from algorithm
question: Which one is a valid Karel program, that moves Karel 2 steps forward?

name: How to run a Karel program?
question: What is the correct button to press to run a Karel program?

choices.choice: A button with a running man on it
